article.headline: Colorado State 76, Northern Colorado 68
article.story: FORT COLLINS, Colo. (AP) -- Phillip Thomasson ignited a second-half comeback and Matt Nelson had 17 points and seven rebounds as Colorado State held off Northern Colorado 76-68 Monday night. Thomasson had only eight points -- but he scored all of them at the start of the second half. Jason Smith added 12 points and Michael Morris had 10 for the Rams (2-0). Sean Nolen led Northern Colorado (0-3) with 16 points. Matt Kline had 13 for the team, outscored 171-108 in the two previous games. The Bears haven't beaten Colorado State since Dec. 2, 1986, when they won 56-54. Trailing by nine at the half, the Rams got a boost when Thomasson scored all eight of his points in the first seven minutes of the second half. Morris tied it at 45 with a 3-pointer. When Matt Williams hit a fadeaway jumper with 3:38 left, Colorado State's lead was 65-52 with 3:38 left in the game. Northern Colorado got as close as 72-66 on Erik Olson's 3-pointer with 37 seconds left. But the Rams sealed the win with two free throws. In the first half, Northern Colorado used a variety of zones to force 14 turnovers and take a 38-29 lead at intermission. Kline and James Randle had consecutive baskets to cap a 14-5 run and lead 23-16. Michael Gordy's 3-pointer finished a 9-0 run to give Northern Colorado its largest lead, 34-20. Nelson scored four points in the final two minutes to get Colorado State within nine points at the break.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
